id.property: 要介護認定申請情報受給Entity.shinseishoKanriNo

association.property: 要介護認定申請情報受給Entity

id.property: 要介護認定申請情報受給Entity.shinseishoKanriNo

mapper.select:
SELECT "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."taishoKaishiYMD" as "taishoKaishiYMD" ,"DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."taishoShuryoYMD" as "taishoShuryoYMD" ,"DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."taishoKaishiTimestamp" as "taishoKaishiTimestamp" ,"DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."taishoShuryoTimestamp" as "taishoShuryoTimestamp" ,"DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendo" as "nendo" ,"DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendoNaiRenban" as "nendoNaiRenban"
FROM ( SELECT "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."subGyomuCode" as "subGyomuCode" ,"DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shichosonCode" as "shichosonCode" ,"DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriName" as "shoriName" ,"DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriEdaban" as "shoriEdaban" ,MAX("DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendo") as "nendo" ,MAX("DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendoNaiRenban") as "nendoNaiRenban"
FROM rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" AS "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"
WHERE "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."subGyomuCode" = 'DBD' AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shichosonCode" = #{市町村コード} AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriName" = #{処理名} AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriEdaban" = '0001'
GROUP BY "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."subGyomuCode", "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shichosonCode", "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriName", "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriEdaban" ) A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" AS "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" ON "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."subGyomuCode" = A."subGyomuCode" AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shichosonCode" = A."shichosonCode" AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriName" = A."shoriName" AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriEdaban" = A."shoriEdaban" AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendo" = A."nendo" AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendoNaiRenban" = A."nendoNaiRenban"

select.id: get一括発行認定結果通知書情報

mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
, , , FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"
INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS "DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
LEFT OUTER JOIN AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shikibetsuCode" = "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode"
WHERE "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."jukyuShinseiJiyu" IN ('1', '2', '3') AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYMD" IS NOT NULL
AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiKekkaTsuchishoHakkoYMD" IS NULL
AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo" NOT IN ( SELECT "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo" FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS "DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."jukyuShinseiJiyu" IN ('1', '2', '3') AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYMD" IS NOT NULL
AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiKekkaTsuchishoHakkoYMD" IS NULL
AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."chokkinFlag" IS TRUE )
UNION ALL
SELECT
, , , FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"
INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS "DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
LEFT OUTER JOIN AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shikibetsuCode" = "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode"
WHERE "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."jukyuShinseiJiyu" IN ('1', '2', '3') AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYMD" IS NOT NULL
AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiKekkaTsuchishoHakkoYMD" IS NULL
AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."chokkinFlag" IS TRUE ) AS "TEMP" ORDER BY #{出力順}

select.id: get一括発行サービス変更通知書情報

mapper.select:
SELECT
, , FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"
INNER JOIN (SELECT "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo" FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" WHERE "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."chokkinFlag" IS TRUE ) AS "B" ON "B"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
LEFT OUTER JOIN AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shikibetsuCode" = "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode"
WHERE "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."chokkinIdoJiyuCode" = '04' AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."jukyuShinseiJiyu" = '5'
AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."serviceHenkoTsuchishoHakkoYMD" IS NULL
ORDER BY #{出力順}
LIMIT 2

select.id: get一括発行要介護度変更通知書情報

mapper.select:
SELECT
, , FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"
INNER JOIN (SELECT "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo" FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" WHERE "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."chokkinFlag" IS TRUE ) AS "B" ON "B"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
LEFT OUTER JOIN AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON "DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shikibetsuCode" = "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode"
WHERE "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."chokkinIdoJiyuCode" = '02' AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."jukyuShinseiJiyu" = '4' AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYMD" IS NOT NULL
AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."kubunHenkoTsuchishoHakkoYMD" IS NULL
ORDER BY #{出力順}
LIMIT 2
